TopicTitle: Organize flights in the Tracking Station

Articles.Content: I know you can filter flights but is there any way to organize the flights in the Tracking Station? I want to be able to organize my flights not by date/time launched but by celestial body so I can have all of one planet/moons probes, stations and bases together because in late game I tend to have around 30 or so probes that are mapping and so on but are scattered throughout the list. A bit of order would be nice. Any help would be appreciated

You're not the only one who wants this. It's been high on the community's wish list for a long time.

As far as I know there are no mods capable of bringing order to this chaos.
